message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_START_DATE_END_DATE
message.locale: The End Date must be equal to or later than the Start Date of the outcome.

message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_NAME_DUPLICATE
message.locale: An outcome with this Name already exists.

message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_NAME_TRANSLATION_DUPLICATE
message.locale: An Outcome name translation for this language has already been created.

message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_INACTIVE_CANNOT_MODIFIED
message.locale: This outcome may not be modified as it has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_ALREADY_DELETED
message.locale: This outcome has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_WITH_DECISIONMATRIX_LINK
message.locale: This outcome is already being used in a decision matrix and therefore cannot be deleted.
